name: Prem Acharya
message: He is one of the best person to follow if you are introvert and want to come out of the introvert zone like me. Thank you Francesco for everything you have done for the devCommunity.

name: Dented Code
message: I won't have come this far if it wasn't for you. Thank you for being such an inspiring for introvertuber

name: Ibrahim Abdullahi
message: One of the awesome people I interact with from the other side of world since I started coding, thank you for everything.
